data.message: Insults his fans, looks old af (remember when u used to make fun of old men rapping), and has not dropped a good album in what must be a decade. Yeah, sorry Eminem, you were a fond part of my life, but now you are just a beaten down drug abuser who raps with people in parking garages.

replies.message: Still better than today's funky and asshole rappers...he is the best..no matter he is underground
I like how you think he cares what you think lmao
Acting like MMLP2 isn’t the best rap album of the decade..fuck outta here
onya dave u clown
Must be a trump supporter, bar for bar even though Em is old he would out rap anyone bar for bar still to this day
40 isn't old child.
Show me on the doll where he hurt you
kinda agrees
Why are you following him then?
He's been insulting his fans since the very beginning, fam. Never hurt him before.
2017 stans get hooked to every new dick in town claiming to be the best. Go care your pussy
Don't get all political and hit that unfollow button.
Dave fuck you and unlike this page
Fuck you dave
Michael Rosentreter MMLP2 had some great songs like wicked ways, groundhog day and baby (which were all deluxe edition if I remember correctly) but overall it was pretty shite lol
LOL that's why you're on his page liking his page and commenting on it haha there's a word for that and it's called Dick Rider and that's exactly what you is
But his last two albums were fire. Stop lying to yourself Dave. You don't have to support him but the music is still OP
He's always insulted his fans, you know like the line in criminal where he calls us all retards lol and I still don't give a fuck lol
What are you even saying right now MMLP2 was a spectacular sequel. You’re just a fucking “their older music is better” type hipster. GTFO
Take your lame ass out of here lol
Why you still like his page and take the time to comment then? Bye Felicia!
If we needed Eminem then, think about how much we need him now... That is all

he has been clean for almost a decade now. so basically what you are saying is you like   music about drug abusing. you obviously do not realize how hard it is to get clean and stay clean. it is super simple just to never use in the first place. but once you are caught up in addiction to pull yourself out of it and stay clean is amazing. he is a superhero in my book.

Lol 90% of you sound like you discovered em yesterday, I was with em since he was a bottle of vodka and some bleach. Take a walk gentleman, he certainly is not clean, if you have done drugs in your life, it is fairly obvious.

I agree with this dude. He still might be the hands down best lyricist but unless this new album is actually a revival to his career then he is officially washed up. Of this is bad then he has officially been washed up longer than he was the greatest. That's just being honest. A fan can be critical and doesn't have to constantly be sucking his dick with fear to say his new stuff sucks.
